answers.answer: Hi Bob1234,Those of us who answer questions posted at this forum are NOT medical professionals, rather we are parents of type 1's or ourselves type 1 and can only share with you our personal experiences revolving around diabetes management.  It wouldn't be advisable for us to offer you any advice or suggestions for your question as this SHOULD be answered by a doctor who has all the appropriate information regarding your situation.  I hope you will consult your medical team and ask them this question to be sure you get the best possible answer for your situation.  Thank you for coming to the forum; we hope you'll return again.
